alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Kingfisher; Logan (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 11 at 6:18PM CDT until May 11 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Kingfisher County in central Oklahoma... Northwestern Logan County in central Oklahoma... Southeastern Garfield County in northern Oklahoma... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 618 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northwest of Cashion, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Crescent, Marshall, Mulhall, Orlando, Douglas, and Lovell. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect for the warned area.
